mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO memberNo, FK_CATEGORY_NO categoryNo, MEMBER_ID memberId, MEMBER_PWD memberPwd, NICKNAME nickName, MEMBER_NAME memberName, PHONE phone, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS createDate FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND FK_CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo}

SELECT ADDRESS_NO addressNo, SC.STATE_CODE stateCode, STATE_NAME stateName, ADDRESS_TYPE addressType, DISTRICT district FROM TB_ADDRESS AD JOIN TB_STATE_CATEGORY SC ON(SC.STATE_CODE = AD.STATE_CODE) JOIN TB_MEMBER ME ON(AD.MEMBER_NO = ME.MEMBER_NO) WHERE ME.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY ADDRESS_TYPE
SELECT STATE_CODE stateCode, STATE_NAME stateName FROM TB_STATE_CATEGORY ORDER BY STATE_CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER ( MEMBER_NO, FK_CATEGORY_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, NICKNAME, MEMBER_NAME, PHONE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, #{categoryNo}, #{memberId}, #{memberPwd}, #{nickName}, #{memberName}, #{phone} )
INSERT INTO TB_ADDRESS ( ADDRESS_NO, STATE_CODE, MEMBER_NO, ADDRESS_TYPE, DISTRICT ) VALUES ( SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL, #{stateCode}, SEQ_MNO.CURRVAL, 1, #{district} )
